mapper.select: SELECT A.CODE_ID AS "codeId" , B.CODE_ID_NM AS "codeIdNm" , A.CODE AS "code" , A.CODE_NM AS "codeNm" , A.CODE_DC AS "codeDc" , A.USE_AT AS "useAt" FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTC_CMMN_CODE B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID WHERE A.CODE_ID = #{codeId} AND A.CODE = #{code}
